events.message: I received the wrong size item and I would like to return it for a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to an incorrect product size sent to the customer.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to handle this customer's refund request regarding the wrong item received.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear about the wrong size you received. I'll assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue and start the refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached a picture clearly showing the size tag on the item I received.
Thank you for the details. We will approve your refund and send you a prepaid return label via email within the next hour.
Thanks for the quick response and for sending the return label promptly. I appreciate the efficient service.
The refund process is now completed once the returned item is received. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We wanted to check in to confirm you received your refund successfully and if everything is satisfactory with your case closure.
As you have confirmed satisfaction with the refund, we will now close this support case. Thank you for your patience.
